★ Limenex - High Performance Managed VPS ★ Pure SSD VPS Available! ★

Limenex.com - High Performance Managed VPS Hosting

Are you looking for an incredible web host or switching from your current host? Choosing the right hosting provider is extremely important. Frequent downtime, slow servers and non-existent support can be disastrous for any website.

With the myriad of hosting companies to choose from, we know it is hard for you to make a choice. With Limenex, the choice is obvious. We give you everything you need and more to run your websites smoothly with an incredible support team available 24/7 to assist you.

Limenex Web Hosting is a company that cares for its customers. We strongly believe in delivering the best for our customers. Hence, we build all our servers with top-quality hardware coupled with plenty of innovative software to deliver a whole new high performance web hosting experience for you! With the addition of our knowledgeable staffs working behind the scenes, blazing fast loading speed, high uptime, incredible technical support and features-packed hosting service are some of the ways we keep our customers happy!

Reliable and dependable web hosting does not have to break the bank. Host with Limenex now and enjoy excellence at its finest. Switch to Limenex today and we will migrate your websites for free!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Hosting Features ★

- REAL 24/7 AWESOME SUPPORT (10-20 minutes average response)
- Fast & Powerful High Performance Servers
- Fully Managed by Professionals - http://limenex.com/web-hosting/managed-support.html
- Powered by Virtuozzo
- FREE cPanel/WHM
- FREE Daily Backup
- Full Root Access
- Dallas, TX Data Centre
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- In Business Since 2010
- And many other features!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Plans & Prices ★

Fully Managed VPS

All Limenex Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are fully managed for FREE. We will handle the technical details so that you can focus on running your websites without worrying about the geeky stuffs. Every managed VPS is secured and optimised before delivery so that you can start hosting your sites right after you receive the login email.

VS1

* 60 GB RAID Protected Disk Space
* 4,000 GB Premium Bandwidth
* 1.5 GB Guaranteed RAM
* cPanel/WHM Control Panel
* 2 Dedicated IP Addresses

Prices starting from $50/mo.

Fully Managed SSD VPS

Limenex's Managed SSD VPS packages are based on cutting edge pure SSD drives. There's no cutting of corners with "SSD caching". These are bona fide SSD drives powering your entire VPS to deliver optimal performance.

All Limenex Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are fully managed for FREE. We will handle the technical details so that you can focus on running your websites without worrying about the geeky stuffs. Every managed VPS is secured and optimised before delivery so that you can start hosting your sites right after you receive the login email.
